db:abstract.db:para: Specifies the location of Qt libraries on the target device.

db:article.db:para: Specifies the location of Qt libraries on the target device.

db:note.db:para: This property is in technology preview and may change in future releases.
This property is used only if targeting the Android platform.

db:article.db:para: This property can be set to provide a path to Qt libraries on the target device, when those libraries are installed outside app's native (JNI) library directory.
